entry.title: First Post
entry.content:
Week 10:

This is our last week of class and I am beyond excited and mentally exhausted. Majority of my days, since I started this class, is spent trying to complete and correct assignments and projects that are somewhat complex, but it gives me an opportunity to be creative. I have learned a lot of information from this course and I enjoyed meeting all the different type of people from diverse backgrounds. Right now I am in a group with some very talented individuals that take pride in web development and graphic design and it is truly inspiring. I came up with a part of the project where I used my imagination with a fun spin on it. I got feedback from classmates and it was positive and made me feel like I was being a team player. So where ever this opportunity may take us I wish everyone well on their future endeavours. This has been a journey, more than like an adventure and I am forever grateful to be apart of YWEB because it has opened up doors for me. One more week until graduation!! Yesssss!

entry.title: First Post
entry.content:
Week 9:

Two more weeks to graduation, today is my 24th birthday and this will be my first accomplishment since graduating from high school.Words can’t express how happy I will be when this class is DONE!!! I remember when I first started this class and I was told that there will be times where you feel like you want to quit and your mental capacity will be exhausted to the fullest. I feel like that completely and I appreciate my instructors who are being flexible with everything that’s going on with my personal life. I totally dislike the fact that we chnaged the classroom location, but I’m dealing with it because class is almost over. Right now I am giving all that I have to remain focused and finish the course. I am doing my best to communicate with my case managers, instructors, and classmates. They are a great help with keeping me up to date with the new project that we just started. There are some very smart young men in the class with awesome ideas and I enjoy them sharing their advance knowledge and creativity.
